name: FloorGenerator
description: 用於生成地板圖案（木地板，瓷磚等）的插件.支持SketchUp 2024 Ruby API / A plugin for generating floor patterns (wood floors, tiles, etc.) in SketchUp. Supports SketchUp 2024 Ruby API.
